definition[0]: an important job that involves travelling somewhere, done by a member of the air force, army etc, or by a spacecraft
example[0]: He was sent on over 200 missions before being killed in action.
example[1]: US troops taking part in the peacekeeping mission
example[2]: the first manned space mission to Mars
definition[1]: an important job that someone has been given to do, especially when they are sent to another place
example[3]: Her mission was to improve staff morale.
example[4]: a group of US congressmen on a fact-finding mission to Northern Ireland
example[5]: scientists on a mission to the rainforest, to study possible medicinal uses of plants
definition[2]: something that you feel you must do because it is your duty
example[6]: Tomâ€™s mission was to help young people in his local community.
example[7]: His main mission in life is to earn as much money as possible.
definition[3]: the purpose or the most important aim of an organization
example[8]: The mission of International House is to enable students of different cultures to live together and build life-long friendships.
definition[4]: a group of important people who are sent by their government to another country to discuss something or collect information
example[9]: a British trade mission to Moscow
definition[5]: religious work that involves going to a foreign country in order to teach people about Christianity or help poor people
definition[6]: a building where this kind of work is done, or the people who work there
definition[7]: an important job that someone is given to do
example[10]: Her mission was to improve staff morale and output.
definition[8]: the aim of a company or organization
example[11]: Our mission is to provide quality long-term care to the maximum number of patients.
definition[9]: a trip that a group of people are sent on, for example in order to collect information
example[12]: He has just been on a fact-finding mission to China.
definition[10]: a group of people who are sent by their government or an important organization to another country to collect information, have discussions etc
example[13]: The UN has sent a mission to the area.
